name: rental_id
description: A unique ID for the table.

name: start_station_id
description: The ID of the station where the journey began.

name: end_station_id
description: The ID of the station where the journey ended.

name: start_weather_id
description: The ID of the weather where/when the journey began.

name: end_weather_id
description: The ID of the weather where/when the journey ended.

name: start_timestamp_id
description: The timestamp ID when the journey began.

name: end_timestamp_id
description: The timestamp ID when the journey ended.

name: start_timestamp
description: The timestamp when the journey began.

name: end_timestamp
description: The timestamp when the journey ended.
